# Metalminer

## Install

<pre>
  git clone git://github/sjaak666/metalminer.git
  cd metalminer
  npm link
</pre>

## Usage

```javascript
var mm = require('metalminer');
metalminer.getLyrics(req.query, function (err, data) {
    if (!err) {
        res.send(data);
    } else {
        res.send('Lyrics not found: ' + err);
    }
});
```
